Title: Creating a Task Queue with Redis and Flask-Redis
Summary: A task queue is a system that lets you schedule tasks to run in the future. Rather
than running tasks immediately, they are added to a queue to run at a later time. This
gives you the flexibility to run your tasks when it's convenient for you, or based on some
schedule. This tutorial will show you a basic task queue using the Flask framework and the
Redis database.
